Welcome to truly special world and be amazed by nature.
Welcome to truly special world and be amazed by nature.
Welcome to truly special world and be amazed by nature.

Nestled in the midst of coconut trees in the northern part of Gili Trawangan, Gili Khayangan Villas is the perfect depiction of Khayangan, a concept of 'heaven’ held close to the hearts of the ancient Javanese.

Situated within a short walking distance to pristine white sandy beaches and crystal clear blue water, our resort offers plenty of family-friendly activities such as yoga, surfing, snorkelling, horseback riding, mini golf or cooking classes. To ensure that everyone has an enjoyable stay, we also offer off-site babysitting services, school holiday programs and immersion classes so that even the busiest of parents can enjoy a romantic meal or stroll on the beach.

With an impressive international menu that includes local delights, the Gili Khayangan restaurant will satisfy your every craving, be it good grills or western food. Top it off with drinks at the bar, or perhaps enjoy a well-deserved couple's massage in the immaculate setting of your villas, with en-suite swimming pools.

Gili Khayangan, comprising of 1 three-bedroom luxury villa, 3 two-bedroom luxury villas and 4 one-bedroom villas, is in a multitude of ways, 'heaven' on earth.

We are just minutes away by sea and land!
Choose from 1 bedroom to 3 bedrooms tailored to your needs and requirements!

3 Bedroom Villa (Tupac Suite)

Room size 330 square metres (inclusive of 3 bedrooms,
pool and pool deck, dining/living area and kitchenette/bar area)
Maximum Occupation : 6 adults and 3 children
  • Private living room with rustic ratten style sofa
  • Private dining room with solid teak dining table and 6 chairs
  • Private kitchenette/bar area with refrigerator equipped with
    snacks and hydration necessities
  • Powder room near kitchenette/bar
  • Ceiling fan in living/dining room
  • Smart/internet TV in living room
  • Cable TV with full listings of international channels in living room
  • Luxurious en-suite bathroom in all the bedrooms
  • shower with hand shower with hot/cold water in the bathrooms
  • Air-conditioning in all the bedrooms
  • Deluxe Queen Size or 2 Single Size Setia Beds with Bed Frame and 4 nos. of Quality Pillows
  • Roll-away bed for 1 child to be arranged upon request
  • Deluxe queen size or 2 single size setia beds with bed frame and 4 nos. of quality pillows for all the bedrooms
  • Roll-away bed for 3 children available upon request
  • Safe deposit box in all the bedrooms
  • Open concept wardrobe complete with a dresser in all the bedrooms
  • In-room telephone
  • Day and night curtains in all the bedrooms
  • Private swimming pool with pool deck

2 Bedroom Villa (Neptune Suite, Bruce Lee Suite, John Lennon Suite)

Room size 150 square metres (inclusive of 2bedrooms,
pool and pool deck and dining/living area)
Maximum Occupation : 4 adults and 2 children
  • Private living room with rustic ratten style sofa
  • Private dining room with solid teak dining table and 4 chairs
  • Ceiling fan in living/dining room
  • Refrigerator equipped with snacks and hydration necessities in dining room
  • LCD TV in living room
  • Cable TV with full listings of international channels
  • Luxurious en-suite bathroom in all the bedrooms
  • Rain shower with hand shower with hot/cold water in the bathrooms
  • Air-conditioning in all the bedrooms
  • Deluxe queen size or 2 single size setia beds with bed frame and 4 nos. of quality pillows for all the bedrooms (Single size beds in one of the bedrooms in John Lennon Suite only)
  • Roll-away bed for 2 children available upon request
  • Safe deposit box in one of the bedrooms
  • Open concept wardrobe complete with a dresser in all the bedrooms
  • In-room telephone
  • Day and night curtains in all the bedrooms
  • Private swimming pool with pool deck
